clauses.title: Content you post may be edited by the service for any reason
clauses.description: This service can edit any content on the service for whatever the reason and at their sole discretion.

case.text: Content you post may be edited by the service for any reason

clauses.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user.
clauses.description: The Agreements can be updated at any time, including in a way that negatively affects user rights, without notifying before or after the changes.

case.text: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you

clauses.title: Tracking via third-party cookies purposes including advertising
clauses.description: The service's website sets third-party cookies (cookies that do not belong to their domain) for purposes not including statistics and analytics.
clauses.clause_text: Our ad partners may collect data and use cookies for ad personalisation and measurement.

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for advertising

clauses.title: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason
clauses.description: At any time, your account can be terminated without explanation and without warning by the service.
clauses.clause_text: We reserve all rights to terminate accounts, edit or remove content and cancel orders in our sole discretion.

case.text: Your account can be deleted or permanently suspended without prior notice and without a reason

clauses.title: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes
clauses.description: The service may use your personal data for marketing, such as sending you personalised offerings.
clauses.clause_text: We process your information in the following ways: To administer and process orders, downloads and notification emails linked to the administration of your account on our site. To prevent unlawful use or distribution of our products and for internal marketing purposes.

case.text: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes

clauses.title: Your personal data is given to third parties
clauses.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties essential to the serviceâ€™s operation. This could be an external spam detection service for an internet forum.
clauses.clause_text: We share your name, email, product ordered and associated details of such product and address details with TS Controllers if you purchase one of their products so that they can process your order

case.text: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation

clauses.title: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication
clauses.description: The service tracks the user count or some actions of the user; this is usually used for statistics. For example, emails sent by a service can contain a pixel tag, which is a small, clear image that can tell them whether or not you have opened an email and what your IP address is.
clauses.clause_text: Email marketing messages that we send may contain tracking beacons / tracked clickable links or similar server technologies in order to track subscriber activity within email marketing messages.

case.text: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication

clauses.title: Your personal data is used for limited purposes
clauses.description: Your Personal Data is only used for the essential purposes of the Service, which are clearly defined on the Agreements. For instance, the Service won't abuse your data to deliver targeted advertisements to you or for marketing purposes.
clauses.clause_text: we are only processing personal data for the core business purposes

case.text: Your personal data is used for limited purposes

clauses.title: You can request access and deletion of personal data
clauses.description: Users have the right to access personal data hold by the Service, correct it and/or permanently delete it. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text:
Under the GDPR your rights are as follows. You can read more about your rights in details here;

  • the right to be informed;
  • the right of access;
  • the right to rectification;
  • the right to erasure

case.text: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data

clauses.title: The service provides information about how they collect personal data
clauses.description: The service details situations in which they collect personal information or means by which they do.
clauses.clause_text: Before you continue using our website we advise you to read our privacy policy regarding our user data collection.

case.text: Information is provided about how they collect personal data

clauses.title: The service's data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes
clauses.description: The service will remove personal data from its systems once it is no longer required. Depending on the type of information and the reason it was collected, data retention periods will vary.
clauses.clause_text: We shall stop processing your personal information if the lawful basis used is no longer relevant.

case.text: The data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes

clauses.title: This service does not force users into binding arbitration
clauses.description: Binding Arbitration is a dispute resolution method involving a neutral third party which will render a decision instead of going to court. Since the arbitrator can decide the outgoing of a dispute without evidences or a legal basis, it is preferable that users decide whether they want or not their dispute to be resolved this way.
clauses.clause_text: Any dispute related in any way to your visit to this website or to products you purchase from us shall be arbitrated by state or federal court [your location] and you consent to exclusive jurisdiction and venue of such courts.

case.text: You arenâ€™t forced into binding arbitration in case of disputes

clauses.title: This service allows you to retrieve an archive of your data
clauses.description: Users can request a copy of the data collected through the services and infer from it the amount of personal information that is processed and stored by the Service. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text: "Under the GDPR your rights are as follows. [...] the right to data portability"

case.text: You can retrieve an archive of your data

clauses.title: The service provides a complaint mechanism for the handling of personal data
clauses.description: The service provides users with contact information for an internal or external structure to lodge complaints. It also provides users with contact information for a higher data protection / privacy office in case the internal mechanism fails to satisfy the user.
clauses.clause_text: You also have the right to complain to the ICO [www.ico.org.uk] if you feel there is a problem with the way we are handling your data.

case.text: A complaint mechanism is provided for the handling of personal data

clauses.title: The service has non-exclusive use of your content
clauses.description: The service can pay for your content and you are allowed to make it commercially available to other services/parties.
clauses.clause_text: When you post your content, you grant us non-exclusive, royalty-free and irrevocable right to use, reproduce, publish, modify such content throughout the world in any media.

case.text: The service has non-exclusive use of your content

clauses.title: You can opt out of promotional communications
clauses.description: You can update your account preferences and/or easily unsubscribe of email/sms lists to stop receiving promotional communications.
clauses.clause_text: See any marketing messages for instructions on how to unsubscribe or manage your preferences, you can also unsubscribe from all MailChimp lists, by following this link, otherwise contact the EMS provider.

case.text: You can opt out of promotional communications

clauses.title: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service
clauses.description: The service assumes no liability for any damages the user incurs, including tangible (e.g. profits) and intangible losses (e.g. data), resulting from the use or inability to use the service or any other matter relating to the service.
clauses.clause_text:
TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LAWS WE.
ON BEHALF OF OUR DIRECTORS.
OFFICERS, EMPLOYEES, AGENTS, SUPPLIERS.
LICENSORS AND SERVICE PROVIDERS, EXCLUDE AND DISCLAIM LIABILITY FOR ANY LOSSES AND EXPENSES OF WHATEVER NATURE AND HOWSOEVER ARISING

case.text: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service

clauses.title: You are allowed to quote their content with attribution
clauses.clause_text: You may include references to this software in other products provided the software itself is not included and credit is given for the softwareâ€™s use and reference.

case.text: You are allowed to quote their content with attribution

clauses.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service
clauses.description: Most browsers allow users to set preferences related to cookies storage. You may choose to block all cookies (including first-party cookies), but it may impact your use of this service and you may not be able to access some or any of the features provided.
clauses.clause_text: Some cookies are required to enjoy and use the full functionality of this website.

case.text: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

clauses.title: This service has a no refund policy with some exceptions
clauses.description: Payments can be refunded if some requirements are fulfilled.
clauses.clause_text:
Any money received for products purchased will not be refunded where the product and any applicable license has been distributed to you. Any order, which has been paid, but not fulfilled, shipped or processed, will be refunded.

Distance Selling Regulations

Under the Consumer Contracts Regulations you have the right to cancel any purchase of a digital download within a 14 day â€˜cooling offâ€™ period. By downloading a digital product within the 14 days waives the right to a cooling off period.

We are unable to offer refunds for purchases that are outside of the 14 day cooling off period.

Subscriptions are refundable within 14 days provided no download has been made from the account to which the subscription applies.

case.text: This service has a no refund policy with some exceptions

clauses.title: Prohibits political discussions or campaigning
clauses.description: Political content in the form or pictures, discussions, or campaigning isn't allowed.
clauses.clause_text: Full context: "Content has to be free of software viruses, political campaign"

case.text: Political discussions or campaining are prohibited

clauses.clause_text: We grant you a limited license to access and make personal use of this website.

clauses.description: Once users have been permanently banned from this service, they are not allowed to create a new account to keep using the service.
clauses.clause_text: result in your account being deleted and you being banned from making further accounts or purchases.

clauses.title: This service prohibits users from attempting to gain unauthorized access to other computer systems
clauses.description: The service does not allow any attempts at hacking or otherwise gaining unauthorized access to other users' computers.
clauses.clause_text: Content has to be free of software viruses,

case.text: You are prohibited from attempting to gain unauthorized access to other computer systems

clauses.title: If you are the target of a copyright claim, your content may be removed
clauses.description: The content you have published on the service may be removed if it infringes copyright.
clauses.clause_text: "Visitors may post content as long as it is not [...] infringing of intellectual property rights [...] We reserve all rights (but not the obligation) to remove and/or edit such content."

clauses.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account
clauses.description: You are responsible for protecting the confidentiality of your password and for maintaining the security of your account. Any activity occurring under your account is your responsibility, whether authorized by you or not.
clauses.clause_text: If you are an owner of an account on this website, you are solely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your private user details (username and password). You are responsible for all activities that occur under your account or password.

case.text: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

clauses.title: This service requires first-party cookies
clauses.description: First-party cookies only belong to the domain of the service and not a third party.
clauses.clause_text: We use cookies on this website to provide you with a better user experience.

case.text: First-party cookies are used

clauses.title: You cannot distribute or disclose your account to third parties
clauses.description: In this context third-parties refers to anyone including friends, family, or company
clauses.clause_text:
You may own and maintain one personal account to access this website.
You must not share, transfer or allow access to this account with or to any other person.

Where used, such marketing messages may record a range of data such as.
times, dates, I.P addresses, opens, clicks, forwards, geographic and demographic data.

clauses.title: Third parties are involved in operating the service
clauses.clause_text: Any email marketing messages we send are done so through an EMS, email marketing service provider. An EMS is a third party service provider of software / applications that allows marketers to send out email marketing campaigns to a list of users.

clauses.title: Users agree not to submit illegal content
clauses.clause_text: Visitors may post content as long as it is not obscene, illegal, defamatory, threatening, infringing of intellectual property rights, invasive of privacy or injurious in any other way to third parties.

clauses.title: The court of law governing the terms is in the UK
clauses.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction (specified in the title of each point by replacing the "X").
clauses.clause_text: By visiting this website, you agree that the laws of the United Kingdom, without regard to principles of conflict laws, will govern these terms of service, or any dispute of any sort that might come between us and you, or its business partners and associates.
